channel.title: Quartermaster VALIDATE dialect
channel.description:
validate [number "5"][ number: integer! is less than 6 ] == [number 5]
validate/report-to [number "8"][ number: integer! else "Number is not a number!" is less than 5 else "Number is too high!" ] errs: []
probe errs == [ number ["Number is too high"] ]
Source is here:
https://github.com/rgchris/QuarterMaster/blob/0c5f58ff77af31572de5cc76cda9c08c11163d56/qm.r#L1241

item.title: Quartermaster VALIDATE dialect
item.dc:creator: hostilefork
item.description:
validate [number "5"][
    number: integer! is less than 6
]
== [number 5]

validate/report-to [number "8"][
    number: integer! else "Number is not a number!"
    is less than 5 else "Number is too high!"
] errs: []

probe errs
== [
    number ["Number is too high"]
]
